import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import products from './Prodcard'; const ProdScreen = (props) => { console.log(props) const products = products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); return (
Back to result
  • {products.name}
  • {products.rating} Stars ({products.numReviews}) Reviews)
  • Price: $ {products.prix}
  • Description:
    {products.description}
  • Price:$$ {products.prix}
  • Status: {products.status}
  • Qty:{" "} {products.prix}
); } export default ProdScreen
